Posts.Content:
so surprisingly this site has a breast cancer group but not lung cancer. Anyway, what kind of pains you get as initial symptoms? I have been tested for breast cancer but it was clear, now facing a threat of lung cancer. Which is terrifying like any other cancer, except that it has very little hope of survival compared to other cancers. I think I just don't want to find out it's happening or not. How do you deal with these 'mood' during treatment? Well I got a chest CT scan done, I was just about
 to finish a TB treatment but chest pain is still here. In the scan an opacity was visible. But the dr. said it could be some post-TB scar or inflammation or something. After that I've been having more pain. And I am so pissed off I just don't want to go and get checked. Of course, a biopsy is required, but I don't know if it can damage the lung or something. being sick sucks!
Posts.Title: cancer blues

Posts.Content: sherbear thank you. you are right. i think i am just tired of it all. been struggling for two years with illness. anyway i'll be seeing a specialist soon. i am just feeling really down and lazy.
Posts.Title: cancer blues

Posts.Content: I had fluid in my lungs and my doctor asked me to get checked for breast cancer. Well isn't it a good thing if there is no cancer in the fluid? Keep going for follow up check ups though.
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Cells and Fluid in Lungs

Posts.Content: jojo i think you should get checked but could be something normal as well. but it's best to get examined.
Posts.Title: warm sensation in breat
